courseDetails.title: PHP with MySQL: Build 5 PHP and MySQL Projects
courseDetails.shortDescription: Build Cool Projects with PHP MySQL Bootstrap and PDO
courseDetails.longDescription:
Ready to dive into practical web projects? Are you stuck in tutorial hell? want to build your own CV but don't know how and when to start? If so, this is the right project for you. This course contains five projects for a reason. It covers the most common parts of every web project out there. Even if you are experienced as a developer, you should still give it a shot. and the projects are not similar and that's the surprise. Every project covers a certain topic.

First of all, we are going to start with probably what every web project has which is the authentication system. It contains a couple of useful parts like validation, password hashing, sessions, and so on. And for the second project, we are going to take a look at the crud app which will help you manipulate data like a pro, set forms, update, delete and create data. The third project is all about building a URL shortening service and that's pretty simple and yet very practical. We are going to use a bit of Jquery on the way. For the fourth project, which is the largest one of them all, where we are going to integrate our code from the past project (auth system) and we are going to insert images and display them nicely. And that only leaves us with only one project, and that is the email sender that's one of the most important parts of any kind of development because it will teach you to send emails dynamically. And that's actually it. Enjoy every little bit of the course!!
targetAudiences: Every aspiring PHP and MySQL developer
Developers who want to explore web development further
Developers who want create cool projects and to build up their CVs

Digitales Marketing und insbesondere Online Marketing boomen!

Es herrscht eine Goldgräberstimmung, und genau JETZT hat es Sinn, sich mit Online Marketing auseinanderzusetzen - bevor es zu spät ist.

Besonders jetzt, im Jahr 2023/2024 explodiert der Online Traffic und die Werbepreise gehen herunter.

Woran liegt das?

In den letzten 3-4 Jahren hat sich eine Art Onlinemarketing-Hype entwickelt mit internationalen und deutschen Experten, die sehr viel Ahnung haben von E-Mail-Marketing, Leads, Funneln, Conversions und so weiter.

Jedoch hat dieses Wissen bisher kaum den Sprung von den Online-Marketing-Experten (die bisher weitgehend unter sich bleiben und sich untereinander Coachings verkaufen) in die echte Offline-Welt geschafft.

Und genau das ist die Chance, JETZT mit Digitalem Marketing / Online-Marketing anzufangen.

  • Was ist der Unterschied zwischen Zielgruppe und Kunden-Avatar?

  • Du wirst den Zweck einer USP (Unique Selling Proposition) kennenlernen und eine USP für Dich im Kurs erstellen.

  • Außerdem wirst du verstehen, wie Du die Außendarstellung Deiner Persönlichkeit "formst".

Du wirst lernen, wie Du in Windeseile eine eigene Webseite für Dein Business erstellst - damit sicherst Du Dir einen professionellen Auftritt und bist nicht abhängig von teuren Agenturen.

  • Du wirst den Unterschied und sie Einsatzzwecke von WordPress, Wix, Leadpages und Click Funnels kennenlernen.

Leads sind das Allerwichtigste im Online Marketing - damit Dir nicht irgendwann der Boden unter den Füßen weggezogen wird (z.B. wenn ein Social Media Konto gesperrt wird), lernst Du in diesem Kurs auch professionelles E-Mail-Marketing.

  • Wir legen eine komplette Landing Page an inkl. technischer Anbindung - allein das spart Dir monatelanges Herumprobieren oder mehrere Tausend Euro für eine Agentur.

Also worauf wartest Du noch? Schreibe Dich jetzt sofort ein und lerne, wie Du ein erfolgreiches Online Business aufbaust in 14 Tagen - selbst als völliger Anfänger ganz ohne Vorwissen!

Unlock the power of Azure DevOps with this comprehensive beginner's course. Designed for individuals new to DevOps and Microsoft Azure, this course will guide you through the fundamental concepts and tools needed to streamline your software development and delivery processes.

What You'll Learn:

  • Introduction to DevOps and Azure DevOps: Understand the principles of DevOps and the role of Azure DevOps in modern software development.

  • Setting Up Your Azure DevOps Environment: Step-by-step instructions on creating and configuring your Azure DevOps account, projects, and repositories.

  • Source Control with Git: Learn how to manage your source code using Git within Azure Repos, including branching, merging, and pull requests.

  • Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): Automate your build and release pipelines using Azure Pipelines to deliver software faster and more reliably.

  • Azure Boards: Master the use of Azure Boards for planning, tracking, and managing work across your development teams.

  • Collaborative Development: Explore collaborative tools like Azure Test Plans and Azure Artifacts to enhance team productivity and software quality.

Who Should Take This Course:

  • Beginners: No prior experience with Azure DevOps is required.

  • Software Developers: Looking to implement DevOps practices in their projects.

  • IT Professionals: Interested in learning about Azure DevOps as a platform for managing software development and deployment.

  • Project Managers: Wanting to understand how DevOps practices can improve project outcomes.
targetAudiences: ourse is designed for aspiring DevOps professionals, software developers, IT operations staff, and project managers who are new to Azure DevOps or want to deepen their understanding of DevOps practices. Ideal for learners with basic knowledge of software development and cloud concepts, this course is perfect for those looking to streamline development workflows, implement continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD), and improve collaboration within their teams using Azure DevOps tools. No prior experience with Azure DevOps is required.

courseDetails.title: Tally Prime Basic to Advance with GST, Payroll, TDS & more
courseDetails.shortDescription: Beginner friendly, Basic to Advanced Tally Prime. Maintain Accounts of Any Business with Confidence with GST & Payroll
courseDetails.longDescription:
The Tally Prime Fundamentals course is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of Tally Prime software and its practical application in managing financial transactions and accounting processes. Tally Prime is a popular and widely used accounting software solution that simplifies various accounting tasks for businesses of all sizes.

This course will cover the essential features of Tally Prime, starting with the installation process, followed by creating a company and setting up the chart of accounts. Participants will learn how to record day-to-day transactions, perform banking operations, and generate essential financial reports using Tally Prime.


Course Objectives:

  1. Familiarize participants with the Tally Prime software interface and its key components.

  2. Understand the installation process and system requirements for Tally Prime.

  3. Learn how to create a new company in Tally Prime and configure company settings.

  4. Gain proficiency in setting up the chart of accounts, including ledgers, groups, and cost centers.

  5. Develop skills in recording various types of transactions, such as sales, purchases, payments, and receipts.

  6. Explore the banking features in Tally Prime, including bank reconciliation and fund transfers.


Course Outline:

  1. Introduction to Tally Prime

    • Overview of Tally Prime software and its benefits

    • Understanding the user interface and navigation

  2. Installation and Company Setup

    • System requirements and software installation

    • Creating a new company and configuring company settings

  3. Chart of Accounts

    • Creating ledgers, groups, and cost centers

    • Defining account classifications and hierarchies

  4. Recording Day-to-Day Transactions

    • Entering sales and purchase transactions

    • Managing cash and bank transactions

    • Handling journal entries and adjusting entries

  5. Banking in Tally Prime

    • Explain how to record bank transactions, reconcile bank statements, and manage your bank accounts using Tally Prime.

  6. Generating Financial Statements:

    • Provide instructions on how to generate financial statements like profit and loss statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements in Tally Prime.

  7. Data Security:

    • Discuss best practices for securing your Tally Prime data, including user access control, data backup, and password protection.

  8. Storage and Classification of Inventory:

    • Explain how to manage your inventory in Tally Prime, including how to classify items, record stock movements, and perform stock valuation.

  9. Accounts Receivable and Payable Management:

    • Detail how to track and manage accounts receivable (money owed to you) and accounts payable (money you owe to others) in Tally Prime.

  10. Purchase and Sales Order Processing:

    • Describe the process of creating and managing purchase and sales orders within Tally Prime.

  11. Price Level and Price Lists:

    • Explain how to set up and use price levels and price lists to manage product pricing in Tally Prime.

  12. Manufacturing Process:

    • If applicable, provide information on how to manage manufacturing processes and inventory in Tally Prime.

  13. Tracking Additional Cost of Purchase:

    • Describe how to track additional costs associated with purchases, such as taxes, shipping, and handling fees.

  14. Cost and Profit Center Management:

    • Explain how to set up and manage cost centers and profit centers to analyze financial performance.

  15. Budgets and Scenarios:

    • Discuss how to create budgets and scenarios in Tally Prime for better financial planning and analysis.

  16. Generating and Printing Reports:

    • Provide guidance on generating and customizing various reports in Tally Prime for better decision-making.

  17. GST Details - HSN Codes - Intrastate and Interstate GST in Tally Prime:

    • Explain how to manage Goods and Services Tax (GST) details, including HSN codes, and how to handle intrastate and interstate GST transactions.

  18. Tax Deducted at Source (Income Tax) and Tax Collected at Source (TCS):

    • Describe how to handle TDS and TCS deductions and compliance in Tally Prime.

  19. Job Costing and Job Work:

    • If relevant, explain how to use Tally Prime for job costing and job work management.

  20. Advanced GST in Tally Prime Theory:

    • Cover advanced GST concepts, such as reverse charge mechanism and e-way bills.

  21. Advance TDS and Payroll Management in Tally Prime:

    • Detail advanced TDS concepts and how to manage payroll in Tally Prime.
targetAudiences: Beginner Tally prime learner

courseDetails.title: Microsoft Excel Training - Beginner to Expert Level in Hindi
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Microsoft Excel, including logical statements, advanced functions, data formatting, VBA macros, and more.
courseDetails.longDescription:
(माइक्रोसॉफ्ट एक्सेल को प्रभुत्व के लिए व्यापक कोर्स, जिसमें तार्किक कथन, उन्नत फंक्शन, डेटा स्वरूपण, VBA मैक्रो, और अन्य शामिल हैं।)


           Welcome to the "Mastering Microsoft Excel" course! This comprehensive guide is designed to take you from a beginner level to an advanced user of Microsoft Excel. Throughout this course, you will learn a wide range of functions and features to enhance your data analysis, reporting, and presentation skills using Excel, including macros and VBA (Visual Basic for Applications) programming.

Module 1: Introduction to Excel

  • Understanding the Excel interface

  • Navigating workbooks and worksheets

  • Entering and formatting data

  • Basic formula writing and cell references

  • Managing workbooks and sheets

Module 2: Logical Statements and Basic Functions

  • Introduction to logical statements (IF, IF-ELSE, nested IF)

  • Utilizing logical functions for data analysis

  • The SUMIF function for conditional summing

  • The COUNTIF function for conditional counting

Module 3: Advanced Functions

  • Introduction to the "THEN" function

  • Utilizing advanced functions (e.g., SUMIFS, COUNTIFS)

  • Using the "IF" function in conjunction with other functions

  • Working with date and time functions (e.g., TODAY, NOW, DATE, TIME)

Module 4: Data Formatting and Protection

  • Conditional formatting to highlight data

  • Custom formatting for cells and data

  • Protecting files with passwords and permissions

  • Data protection techniques to prevent unwanted changes

Module 5: Data Organization and Management

  • Hiding and unhiding rows and columns

  • Sorting and filtering data for analysis

  • Organizing data using tables and named ranges

Module 6: Lookup and Reference Functions

  • Vertical Lookup (VLOOKUP) for finding data in tables

  • Horizontal Lookup (HLOOKUP) for finding data in tables

  • Utilizing INDEX and MATCH functions for dynamic lookups

Module 7: Macros and VBA Programming

  • Understanding macros and their benefits

  • Recording simple macros to automate tasks

  • Writing and editing macros using VBA code

  • Customizing macros to suit specific needs
targetAudiences: Desire to Learn Excel
